name: Britanic
description:
Ship crashes !!! Everyone is fighting for their survival !!! Leonardo is concerned about the salvation of his beloved.
Thousands of passengers want to save their lives, trying to select the salvation door, with which help beloved float.
Help Tommy save his life! You must drown the distraught passengers of the ship so that they do not swim to their goal.
The gameplay of this game is simple and elementary, but in turn bewitch.
Easy to learn at any age. Helps develop fine motor skills
hands and mindfulness. Exclusive, bright, nothing like graphics, pleasant to the eye.
The author's musical accompaniment, created on live instruments, gives a wonderful atmosphere to the game. The ability to compete with friends will brighten up any evening in any
company. And all this for you is absolutely FREE !!!
